1.content: You walk downstairs to find Katelyn sitting on the couch on her laptop. "Hey Kate what are ya doing?" "Not much." she replies. You walk out into the kitchen to get a drink, and come back into the living room and plop down next to her. You turn on the TV. After a few minutes you get bored and decide you want to have a little fun and mess around with Kate. So you decide to poke her in the side. "hahahah!! stop it Brian you know I'm ticklish!" Katelyn says. You in your attempt to have fun poke her again. "Brian I'll hurt you.." Shes says this to you with a straight face. "Hahahah your funny Kate you couldn't hurt me even if you tried!" "You wanna bet?' "Yea I do lets go wrestle me right now!" Kate looks at you and grins. "Okay lets do this!" "On the count of three. 1...2..3!!" Before you can even think of your first move Kate already has a grip on both of your shoulders, she pulls you towards her and puts one foot out to trip you. Your head lands just inches away from the coffee table. Before your able to make an attempt to get up you feel a sudden pressure on your chest. Its Kate. "Hahaha I win!" Kate says mocking you. "Yea yea you won your the best now let me up." "No!" "What do you mean no?" You ask confused "You never listen to me ever when I ask or tell you something..and now your going to pay for it" Kate give you an evil grin and reaches for something on top of the coffee table. You see handcuffs. "Kate what are you doing with those, are they real?" "Yes they are real, I got them from my dad. Hes a cop remember?" You try to struggle and free yourself from her but she becomes angry and wails you in the stomach. "Stop moving!!" She yells "Now put your hands above your head" Not wanting another blow to the stomach you obey her. She then takes one hand and cuffs it to the coffee table leg, and then she does the same with your other hand. "For the next 7days your going to learn to listen to me you will worship me and my feet everyday, you will be my foot slave day and night. Understand?" Not being able to wrap your mind around what just happened you do not reply and Kate becomes angry. She slaps you across the face "Hello?!" She yells irritated "Do you understand?!" "Yes Kate I understand" "Good" She says. First you are going to....

Looks at you cleaning, she inspects yours work, and she laughs... then she says APRIL FOOLS! the real reason I wanted to sleepover this week was because marijuana was legalized in our area two days ago, because you don't watch tv or use the internet I knew you wouldn't know that, you crazy hermit kid! 11112.title: She brings you to the basement

choices: She gets back and reveals her team won (You only worship her feet)

11113.content:
"Shut up and just follow behind me, and stay on all fours or I'll beat you til you wish you had" she exclaims. So you do, following behind her and you notice her outfit. She's wearing a blue jersey and some white sports jeans. You look down and watch her feet as she walks, staring at her soles each time they lift off the floor, clueless to what is going on and praying its not what you think. She plans to make you worship her feet, clean them to her hearts content, but not right now, later on tonight. For now she leads you to a small room in the basement, there's nothing in there but a ceiling light and support beam for the house, that she ties you to.

"You're going to be staying in here today," she says, "until I get home tonight after the game." The game? What game you think to yourself. You're startled by a basket being dropped in front of you, to your dismay, it's full of socks. "If you get thirsty, you can suck the sweat out of my socks, there should be plenty to hold you over til 5:00." Bingo, you think, now I have a time frame of how long I have to get free before she gets back. "And if you get hungry," she tosses you a plastic bag of what looks like the driest Graham crackers in history, "you can munch on these, they should also keep you nice and thirsty." She winks at you and all you can think is how this bitch really wants you to suck on her socks. "That should do it, now I gotta get ready." She leaves the door open and you watch as she walks around the basement looking around. "Found them!" You hear her yell. You watch her go sit in a chair across from the small room you're in carrying a pair of cleats. You sit there and stop paying her attention, and look around, plotting your escape. She slides the cleats on her bare feet as she thinks,"Bare feet in cleats for the next few hours, he's gonna have a lot of sweat to lick up." She finishes up and walks towards your tiny room prison. "Alrighty then slave, you have all you'll need to survive without my precious little feet til I get back, oh and you better be rooting for us, cause if our softball team loses, I may have to bring some of the girls back, so you can cheer them up by servicing they're feet too," she winks again and although you don't want her to have the glory of winning in anything, her feet are enough trouble for you and you really don't want to 'service' anyone extra. You let your head drop and stare at the floor. "Alrighty, see you tonight wittle Bwian," with that she closes the door to the small room and your hear the click of a lock. You listen to her footsteps as she goes up stairs, lastly to make matters worse the light goes off with the main basement light, the two must run off the same switch and you're left in darkness. "How am I to escape now," you think and in the back of your mind you could imagine her taunting voice....

"You don't...."
11113.title: She makes you worship her

choices: Suck it up and submit for one last cleaning
She only out-wrestled you once this week.......
Settle for one of her compromises
1112.content:
You awake groggy, temporarily forgetting your surroundings before being rudely reminded by the soft flesh of Kate's foot rest on your cheek. Rolling your eyes, you go to push it away before remembering that you were also in chains. The only thing somewhat going good for you was the fact that she made you do such a thorough job yesterday with her feet. That way, they didn't reek as they normally did and were fairly clean. The only dilemma left was what to do next? Obviously this situation wasn't going to work for a week, for only god knows what "your" friend could or already hatch up now knowing her dark side. You slumped in careful deliberation, silently enduring her cool feet as you weighed your options.

After a couple of minutes of building up courage, operation get away from Kate was a go, and you kneeled up as straight as you could go. Gently pursing your lips, you blew cold air onto her toes, tickling them gently and carefully. First she kicked, firmly pushing you away until the slack tightened in your restraints. Cautiously moving forward again against her, you tried again. This time she stretched, perhaps momentarily forgetting just what toy she had stored at the end of her bed.

Then setting her eyes upon you, she sat straight up, grinning. "Oh Brian aren't you lucky. You have a looong day with these and I plan to hit the track." She scrunched her toes up under your eyes, pulling at the skin, before settling with pinning your nose between two of her toes. Kate sat content there for a moment as you tried to pull away, again foiled by the lack of slack in the chains. "But first, we need to get them ready don't we?" She moved your head up and down with her heel before popping up and out of bed. "To the bathroom we go, we definitely need a new coat of blue on these nails if we're going to be seen out in public aren't we? And I can only guess you're more than willing to volunteer that cute little face of yours as a footstool as I paint aren't you?" She ruffled your hair then pivoted, bending down to pick up your leash from yesterday. If you weren't so tied up and enslaved, you probably would've enjoyed Kate sticking her rear up in the air like that, but the moment fled as she turned back around, fastening it to your neck.

"Now just how I would position my foot so that I could paint comfortably...along your cheek? Across your forehead?" She mused to herself while she undid the chains, musings that you weren't entirely comfortable with. Suddenly she shot up straight, holding the last chain in her hand. "Does my little foot slave want his nails done? We could match so everyone knows who owns you. Maybe I could even get my name across your forehead huh?" She stepped back and smiled again, envisioning just how to properly mark you.

Kate grabbed your leash, wrapping it around her hand, and started off towards the bathroom, you being practically dragged behind. She stopped only for a moment to open the door, as the bathroom was attached to the bedroom, but that sliver of time was enough for you. You twisted, yanking her arm down, and swept her feet out from under her. Completely stunned, your captor was unable to do anything while you held her down by her neck with one hand, and with the other undo the clip of your collar. After swiftly freeing yourself, you scooted back in exhilaration, but also fear as to what was going to happen next.

She sat up, wide eyed, bracing herself against the back wall as she came to terms with what just happened. The tables turned unexpectedly and Kate seemed to have no clue as to how exactly to fix that issue. You took it upon yourself in that moment to stand up and bolt for the door that led to the rest of the house. In two quick steps you were there, but the knob wouldn't turn. It was locked. Slowly turning back around, it dawned upon you that your once best friend might've been smarter than what you once gave her credit for.

Once again wearing her wicked grin, she snickered. "I'm guessing you want out about now? Well I hate to break the news to you, but I have it and you're going to have to come wrestle me for it if that's what you really and truly want, and we all know how that turned out the first time." She snickered again, rolling her eyes. That situation could very well go both ways as you both were very matched in that aspect and so far this week, you two were even. You started forward, but hesitated, and her smile got wider. She had you right where she wanted to despite the situation not being in her favor.

"How about we negotiate? You come over here and give my feet one last, really good worship and I help you find that blasted little key. Or you could risk it all and wrestle me for it. However, if you lose, that's an entire week of foot worship at my discretion." Kate threw one leg over the other, fully making you aware that her soft, pale, slightly cool soles were still very much in the equation. You threw back a smile, a nervous one, and put your hands up in bewilderment. You leaned against the wall as you took her offers into thought, desperately trying to either make a counteroffer or choose one over the other. While you did that, she collected herself off the floor, almost gliding back to her bed where she took a seat, fully reclining back into her pillows and outstretching her legs. Since you took your sweet time, she started to throw out bored thoughts since she could neither rush nor overpower you without serious effort.

"I suppose we could meet halfway...you promise to owe me a big one and I just throw open the door, practically free of charge? Hmm...Or...ooooh I know, no more feet but you promise to serve me today and you're free of servitude to me for the rest of the week, meaning I open the door tonight? Now I know that sounds good doesn't it my little slave boy? It saddens me to let you go so soon, but alas, you got one up on me I'll admit." She threw up her arms in mock defeat, then letting them free fall back onto the bed with a poof.

You pushed off the wall, taking her up on one of her offers. She's elated.
1112.title: Katelyn is still asleep.

choices: She fully endorsed it. You belonged to Sam now
Perhaps it was just a bit too brutal and you were going to other uses
11123.content:
You rolled your head, stretching your neck in an attempt to prolong having to submit to one of Katelyn’s choices despite getting away from her. It was humiliating that she still had so much power over you, but you had no easy decision or way out of that. After having mulled it over, you sighed, visibly still very ashamed and upset about this whole scenario. She unabashedly bathed in it, not knowing she was relishing her last moments of control over you. “I suppose I could owe you one…” You had no intention of actually paying her back. Once she opened that door, you were gone out of her life and were going to make every attempt to avoid her until graduation. She made a mock pouty face as she had probably wanted you to pick a rougher option. After a moment of silence, perhaps hopefully wishing you’d change your mind, she rolled her eyes and sunk deeper into her bed.
“You just don’t owe me, you owe me a big one remember? That’s the deal.” Katelyn turned her head to stare you down back into some sort of submission. You conceded, letting her have that one, and she beamed, settling back into her mattress. “I suppose I could let you slip by with that...say, you wouldn’t mind if I cashed that in right now would you?” She didn’t even let you have a moment for that to register, much less react. Instead, your captor laughed a screeching laugh, grinning from ear to ear and kicking the foot board in happy excitement. Your face turned pale and you slumped. She turned over, opening the top drawer of the white nightstand and reaching in. Flipping back over, she held a phone to her ear, already in eager conversation with someone.

“Yeah, yeah I got him to owe me a big one. Yeah I know right!? They never know what that means!” She took the phone away from her ear for a moment to let her friend laugh.

Between her own giggles, she managed to say “Hey Brian, you know Sam right? Black hair, basketball team?” Seeing your eyes widen, her laugh turned maniacal as she went back to her conversation.

“Oh he knows who you are alright. You should’ve seen him just now, it looked like he was going to piss himself. I know right! Just like a little dog hearing thunder. Yeah I have him here, in fact I even have him locked up and cornered in my room. Come right over, he’s eager to be property of Sam and the basketball team for the week, aren’t you Brian? Oh! Did you hear that Brian? If she comes over and doesn’t see you under my feet, she’s going to snap you like a twig! Oh that did it, he’s definitely pissing himself now. Come here Brian, get started. Hahaha I know right? Alright Sam, love ya and see ya soon.”

She set the phone back down in the drawer and sat up straight on the bed, facing you. With a stern finger, she pointed down at a now extended and flexed foot. The command was obvious, and she knew she had you right where she wanted you. She even had you where she wanted for the next week despite your best negotiations. Who knew, she and her friends could probably extend this for however long they wanted. You fell to your knees in defeat, pleading for an ounce of mercy. Anything but this nightmare. Katelyn didn’t even consider it, stating that you should’ve been more obedient. Afterall, if you just listened to her, it would just be her feet you’d get acquainted with. Now’d you have to become intimate with the entire basketball team and their captain, Sam.

What was either a lightbulb going off in your head, or a desperate last pseudo-rationalization, you stepped forward before ducking past her and diving for her drawer. If she had her phone in there, surely she had other valuables in there, like a key. She gasped in shock as she watched your frantic actions, maybe you did have a bit of fight still left in you. Getting up to your knees from the poor dive, you ripped it open only to immediately see the top of her phone sticking out from a sea of socks. Gulping your pride, you raised your hand to plunge it in to see if your gamble was successful when Katelyn had enough of your antics. She lashed out, kicking your neck and toppling your unsteady form like a sack of potatoes onto the floor. Groaning, you rolled over and prepared to get back up, only to see the madwoman reach behind the dresser. With two hands and a bit of effort, she brought the sturdy wooden bed stand crashing down onto your vulnerable legs.

You gasped and cried out in agony, trying to move it off before it completely crushed you through. But to no avail, the thing was heavier than you’d ever give it credit for, so you could only watch as she reached into the wreckage of socks and splinters, pull out a key, and drop on your head as if it was any use to you now. She hopped off the bed, instead sitting on the nightstand. The added pressure made it unbearable, causing you to throw your head back in scream in misery. To that, she only placed a single foot across your mouth, smothering your whining under her arch. She smiled, cocking her head as if to ask what’s wrong, as she slid her other foot towards your nose. Just as she was about to pounce for the final kill, the doorbell rang and she jumped up, further forcing the nightstand into your pulverized self. For once, she was out of your sight and you pushed and pulled, but it was simply too much for you. Ironically, you were going to have to wait for your captors to come and save you.

After a moment or two of squirming, you consigned yourself to quiet gasping as you waited for the two to come back up the stairs. And so it took you off guard when you only heard one set of footsteps. From what you could hear, they weren’t soft enough to be Katelyns. Then you realized, you didn’t follow their commands correctly. You didn’t willingly worship Kate’s feet in the time it took for Sam to get here. With renewed strength, you pushed again, but only made it budge the tiniest of space. Then the footsteps stopped. From where you were, you could just barely see the hulking frame of Sam entirely dam up the space in the doorway. She wasn’t fat, nor too muscular. It was mostly just sheer size and being big boned that made her absolutely gargantuan.

Dropping her gym bag, she glanced around for only a moment before seeing your crippled frame pinned underneath a nightstand. She grinned a dopey, smug grin, and shut the door behind her. “Looks like you’ve been a bad boy. Are you making a mess of your generous host’s room? Look at it, there’s socks everywhere and you’ve gone ahead and toppled some of her furniture. Now that’s just not going to do. We’re going to have to teach you some discipline huh?” She strolled over to you, easily removed the pinning object, jammed the drawers back in, and collapsed herself down on the bed frame, which creaked and groaned underneath her powerful form. Petrified and still gasping, you look up at her giant legs and even bigger, more muscular chest. Her limbs were like telephone poles attached to a tank and they rippled with pure, unadulterated strength. Bulging and straining against her gym shorts, her sleek, shining, legs rose up so she could take her tennis shoes off.

“Bud, you have chosen a terribly bad day to end up underneath me.” Even she coughed a little as she peeled her bare slabs of flesh called feet from inside her shoes and a toxic fume filled the once spacious room. She parted her black hair and forced an evil smile through the fog. You tried to retreat into yourself from the eye watering stench, then outwards. You started to crawl away from the bed, towards the bathroom. Anything to get away from that. “Oh no no, I worked hard to get these at their most fatal. Come here.” She shot a foot out, connecting square with your back and crumpling you. After all, a single one of her feet was the easily the size of your head and much, much stronger than you.

Having the wind knocked out of you for the second time that day, you could offer no resistance as she reached down and snatched you up, throwing you down on the bed like she would to a rag doll. You splayed out, devoid of any fight, and she eagerly set about having her way with you. She first pushed you to a side of the bed, then rolled you up in all the blankets and sheets as tight as she could manage. And manage she did, your lungs were as constrained as they were under the nightstand. Then, she tucked you underneath her thighs as she would a saddle, instead reaching her feet out to greet your face than letting them hang down like she would on a horse.

Your eyes watered from both raw fear and the unadulterated stench of her soles as she stretched them out to you, rubbing them up along your neck and tickling your lips with her toes. Your body, firmly stuck within the blanket prison, was pinned and helpless against her gleeful and merciless attack. All you could do is wait it out. Her big toe prodded your sealed mouth in a silent demand to open, but you stalled for as long as you could against the rough flesh of your assailant. You could feel each line of her toe print as if it was sandpaper, and you felt no urge to service them and followed.

She was having none of it, bringing her free leg up to her chest before crashing it into your chest. The blankets, as fluffy as they were, were no cushion against her punishment, and her foot made quick work of your chest, radiating pain through your rib cage amongst sounds of cracks and groans. You screamed out, only for her to take the opportunity to shove her foot into your now wide open mouth. Instantly, sweat, grime, dirt, and hours of what else she picked up exercising poured into your mouth. Your watering eyes now gushed in unabashed tears, and you whimpered what you could from under her smothering, sickly yellow sole. She basked in it, all too obviously planning of the future for you.

During the conquering of you and the sounds it brought on, neither of you noticed Katelyn leaning in the doorway, and of course she had some ideas about this whole venture.
11123.title: Settle for one of her compromises

choices: Clean yourself up for round two?
See if you can get Katelyn to take you back
111231.content:
Somehow, above your broken whimpering and Sam’s earnest harassing, the sound of Katelyn howling with laughter won out. “That’s good, that’s really too good. He is really getting what he deserves. Say, Sam, how about you keep him for awhile? Break him in and toss him back, see if he behaves better after a week buried under the basketball team’s dirty laundry?”

Sam stared at you with her big brown, dumb eyes, chuckling as she grabbed you through the sheets. “Haha yeah. We always love fresh meat in the locker room. Course, I’m gonna have to take this little punk back to my place first. He’s still got some spirit in em.”

You began to scream, begging. “Katelyn, no please! I’ll do anything, I swear! I’ll kiss your feet all you want! Anything but this troll!” All she did was a mock gasp before Sam punched you square in the face with her meaty knuckles. You saw stars for a moment before she threw you off, jumping off after you, planting her massive feet on your stomach. You cried out in agony, tears streaming down your face, pleading for her to get off before she killed you, only to be awarded with a swift kick to the face with a sickly yellow sole. Sam jumped off, grabbing one end of the blanket cocoon, and dragging you down the stairs after a rough “thank you” to your once best friend.

Cursing at you to shut your whining trap as she got you outside, she tossed you in the back of her beater car before throwing her sweat soaked and stained gym bag on top of you, and speeding off towards her shack at the edge of town. “You little twerp, you belong to me now, so you better knock it off with these outbursts. You will not embarrass me, do you understand? Now sniff that bag.” You didn’t need to, it almost reeked more than her, but you complied out of sheer fear at what would happen if she got mad. At hearing you obey her, you saw her smile in the rearview mirror before cranking her music. Your eyes still haven’t stopped watering, and it felt like your nose rotted away forever ago. It wasn’t long until she barreled onto her gravel driveway and yanked you and her bag out of the car, slinging both on her shoulders and walking up the drive.

Sam kicked the old screen door open with one powerful kick, yelling hello to anyone who may be home before turning, walking into her room, slamming her door with another strong kick, and tossing her prize onto her rickety bed. “It’s just my mom around here, don’t worry about her, she’s tiny and doesn’t ever come in here. It’s just you and me.” She unraveled you from Katelyn’s sheets and, before you could take in any of your surroundings, stuffed you under hers, following close behind. She locked eyes with you, stern as ever. “Just you and me,” she repeated, running her hands through your hair. In a flash, she grinned and shoved you down into the darkness of her ratty linens. “Now get to kissin. You know what you’re here for scum.”

You couldn’t fight back against her arms that pushed you into a pair of muscular legs that you couldn’t possibly resist. Instead you made you very reluctantly make your way towards two stench riddled soles already scrunching their toes in hungry anticipation for your face. They weren’t bluffing either, for as soon as they could, they lunged for your cheeks, locking you into a tear jerking and iron like grip. You tried to get a grip on her legs so that you could push or pull on them, but your hands couldn’t make their way around the sheer muscle that built her like a concrete pillar. You were firmly stuck in between two slick, commanding feet that were eagerly exploring every nook and cranny of your miserable face. The salty sweat burned against your lips as she greased your face with a pool of sweat. You could only make the faintest moans from behind a mountain of fetid flesh. She giggled like a school girl in return, moving you to her liking, pushing you deeper and deeper into the old mattress while holding your legs. You were completely and utterly at her mercy, unable to move against her herculean strength and size.

“Oh, I can get so used to this, you making love to my feet like this after every practice, your face soaking up my hard work like a sponge. I heard Katelyn made you give hers kisses. My needs are no different punk. Pucker up or I’ll start breaking things.” She tightened her grip on your arm and you instinctively pecked the closest thing, her big toe. Instantly, you pulled back as far as you could, only to be chased into the dirty fabric by a dirtier foot. “Good boy, gimme more. Don’t stop.” You started to tear up again, gagging as you gave timid kisses to each of her toes. The rotting smell of toe jam and old socks transferred too perfectly into taste, and with each kiss your body crawled in disgust. You could hear her hum to herself as she sandwiched your face. The heat building up within the blankets made the entire experience almost unbearable as you struggled to squirm against the rising fumes and fluids threatening to snuff you out while she used your face as a personal massaging tool.

After what felt like an eternity, you saw light again when your captor decided to lift the blankets to see you buried quite literally in your work. “Don’t stop making out with my dirt, but does my little scum bucket want a break?” She saw you perk up and placed the heels of her feet on your quivering shoulders. “Well I’ll give you a full twenty minute break unsupervised if you can get these things clean enough that you can eat off of them...heh, that’s not such a bad idea is it?” She dropped the blanket on your horrified face, commanding your tongue out. When it didn’t happen in a heartbeat, she lifted her foot, only to smack you with the broadside of it. With the taste of pennies in your mouth and your brain scrambled, you martyred your tongue, scraping it against the hostile surface of Sam’s sole, only for it to curl back in retreat.

She disappointedly sighed, forced your mouth open with two toes on one foot, and scraped her other foot against your exposed tongue like an organic pumice stone as you screamed for mercy. What could’ve easily been years of buildup came off in rotting chunks, traveling down your throat and into your stomach. Dirt, sweat, grime, lint, toejam, dust, gunk, and god knows what else turned your mouth tarmac black as you did your best to free yourself from under her unforgiving body. She howled with sadistic glee as she switched soles, restarting the whole process, breaking every last shred of your sanity with her stinking filth. There wasn’t any possible way you could survive a week, much less a season of basketball doing this. You would die, simple as that. But all you could do was lie there. After an eternity of sheer agony and misery, she kicked your weeping self off the bed, instead crossing her legs and putting her arms behind her head.

“Kiss them one more time and you’ll have your break.” Shaking and retching, you got back up and leaned towards to fulfill her request, only for her to beat you to the punch, wrapping her legs around your head, pulling you in close to her waist. “Hahaha, come on punk, break free. Just break free, come on, what’s the matter? Can’t win against a girl? Pathetic,” She released you, flexing her still wretched smelling toes in your gasping face. You managed to place one weak kiss to her now slightly cleaner arch and backed up, hoping for one shred of mercy. Trying to conceal her joy with annoyance at your pathetic self, she shooed you off. “There’s a bathroom down the hall, go clean yourself up. You smell like a month old sweat rag. And don’t you dare think about running off unless you want a team of trained athletes to hunt you down. Then you’ll have to deal with us all at once. You have twenty minutes to get your rear end back in here before I get mad. Go.” You dashed out of the room, finding yourself in what must’ve been the trashiest place you’ve ever stepped foot in.

Do you
111231.title: She fully endorsed it. You belonged to Sam now

choices: She makes you fully commit to her feet
She trains you to be her little house pet
1112311.content:
You pulled your shirt up, burying your face in it to wipe off what gunk you could as stumbled down the hallway, silently weighing the pros and cons of different situations. You only began to lift it up to look for the shower when you ran into something. Panicking, you dropped your shirt only to hear lowly laughing.

An older woman, aged by smoking, stared at you, examining your body with a careful eye. “Are you the new toy? You poor poor soul. You’re not first, and you’re definitely not the last, I’ll tell you that much. She’s either gonna give you away to one of her thousand cousins when you’re too weak or simply crush you.” She started laughing again. “You poor pour soul, you think my Sam is bad? You do not want to end up with that horde of gremlins. Consider my girl a blessing, but you’re going to die serving this family kid. Here, the bathroom’s right behind you. And move quickly, she really doesn’t like waiting.”

You nodded, turning to walk in, only for her to cough and grab your shoulder, spinning you back around. “What? No thank you for the advice? Surely Sammy doesn’t get all the love?” You gulped, staring down at two gnarled, neglected feet and took a step back. Once again, she laughed. “You silly boy”, she grabbed you, bringing you in close and kneeing you sharply in the groin, bringing a shocked and outcrying boy easily down to the floor. With you where she wanted you, she wiped a clammy sole along your cheek, resting it on your lips. Groaning, you reluctantly gave her what she wanted, causing her to giggle one more time before smacking you with her freshly kissed heel and walking off.

Half getting up, half crawling out of exhaustion and humiliation, you drag yourself into the dingy bathroom, and try to clean up as much of the gunk and grime off of you as quick as you can. With the lukewarm stream of the shower hitting you in the face, you desperately dream of escape, but Sam knows too many people in this town. And that’s assuming you can get out. The doors could be locked for all you know, and her mom surely wouldn’t just let you run out considering she’s in on your misery. With a crushing sense of defeat, you turn the faucet, blindly reaching for a towel. Grabbing the first scrap of fabric, you smear it across your face for only a second before a gagging smell starts a fire in your nose. A horrified noise escapes from your mouth as you open your eyes and toss a beaten, extremely stretched, and an extremely filthy sock across the small bathroom. Almost as if on cue, the house explodes with noise.

The paper thin door shudders and shakes under Sam’s angry fists. “Hurry up scum! I gave you twenty minutes, not a second more! You’re mine and you will obey!” As quickly as you can, you throw your clothes on and open the door, apologizing. She laughs in your face, clutching a tuft of your hair and dragging her kicking prize down the hallway back towards her lair. You protest in pain, but it only fuels her sadistic strength. In no time at all, you’re once again locked in both her room and her grasp. She holds you close, taking a long inhale before warmly smiling.

“You almost smell clean, but you’re going to be stuck with my scent forever. Many broken men are. You’re not like the rest though. You didn’t try to run. You stayed. You might just be another speck of dirt on my foot, but you’re MY special speck of dirt to twist into the ground.” She let go of your hair, instead grabbing either side of your head, forcing her lips onto yours in a deep kiss. Your captor flashed you another happy grin, humming gently. “Now kiss me back” You could barely register what happened before you were thrown to the ground with a smothering sole shoved in your face. “Kiss, and be mine forever.” You squirmed for only a second before a crippling amount of pressure threatened to smush your head into yet another stain on her now yellowed carpet. You did your best to try and appease her, but her foot encapsulated every inch of your face, perfectly molding to it in an inescapable prison. She tries to disguise a laugh as a scoff, curling her toes as you tickle her with your obedient little mouth from somewhere deep under her controlling flesh before sliding her foot off, caressing your face with it the entire way down.

“Now crawl up into bed. We have a long night ahead of us scummy.” Reluctantly you rose, crawling on your hands and knees over to the bed before she picked you up and tossed you the rest of the way. Landing roughly, the mattress just barely was able to spring you back up before she followed, crashing down on top of you. Grinning maniacally, she sat up on your waist, one massive hand menacingly placed on your scalp. As she tugged your hair up again towards her excited self, you looked into her hazel brown eyes, her jet black raven hair. In that smile you could almost see some sick beauty hiding in her insanity as she locked her lips with yours. That thought died as soon as it was created however, because she instantly withdrew in mock disgust.

“Oooh you only gave my sole a little peck and you taste like footsweat. Are they really that bad? You better go clean them up before they get worse.” With that, her warm smile turned hot with malice, and her arms turned steely in their grasp, sliding you down as tribute to her unrelenting legs. You feebly tried to put up your hands to plead with her, but she easily pinned them down as she got comfortable. Sam completely controls you. Conceding to your fate, you instead cupped her colossal foot in your hands and brought it to your face despite every fiber of your being telling you not to. The stench was egregious, but she had you firmly sandwiched between her powerful legs underneath sheets in a locked room. There wasn’t much else you could do for the meantime. And she wasn’t treating you as badly anymore...perhaps she was too tired to torture you any further. All she did was very slowly rub your face against her titans, curling her toes against the curves in your face and tugging at your ears as she drifted off.

Somehow, despite the weight of or the scent of her feet controlling your face or your unshakable fear of Sam, you must've fallen asleep first, as a very sharp pain soon sent you scrambling in panic out of the sheets. For every inch you scooted back, she advanced two steps, anger radiating off of her. “YOU are MINE and so YOU will sleep when I SAY and WORK when I SAY! How dare you do otherwise! COME HERE!” The small room shook with every stomp and shout, only quieting when you bumped into a corner, trapped. She quickly smiled, placing one triumphant foot heavily on your crotch, but not enough to hurt.

“Now I will either make these look like applesauce, or you will apologize and let me teach you to stay up all night.” You gulped, quickly blubbering out a sad sorry as she lifted her foot to your face for you to kiss. “Good, now stay right here.” She bounded out of the room, quickly returning with a laundry basket brimming with stenching clothes. “Come here scummy, this is what happens to slack off losers who can’t stay up past ten.” You rose, still quivering, and she grabbed the back of your head, forcing it face first into the gaping mouth of the bin as if you were bobbing for socks instead of apples.

A melting stench swallowed you as she pushed you deeper, one worse than anything you’ve ever had to deal with before, one infinitely worse than what her vile feet could muster. You screamed, only for it too to be absorbed by the dirty clothes, and no matter how hard you thrashed, she easily held you down with a single hand. You were a mere nothing in her grasp. Occasionally, Sam let you up, only to throw you back down in the hostile fog. You were a rag doll in her hands, only able to weakly flail against her brutal barrage and be consumed by the toxic gas. If she wanted to hold you in there forever, she would. If she wanted to grant you mercy, she could. But she would never do that. Instead, she tossed your sniveling and shaking self aside, strolling back to her bed all while flexing her powerful, controlling muscles. As she laid down the creaking bed frame, she lifted the covers, inviting you back into your own personal hell. Afraid of going back in the bin, you crawled over to her.

Cackling, she grabbed you by the neck and dragged you into bed, pinning your sobbing, broken face against the end of the bed with her unyielding, yellow soles. Shattered, you lay there, dutifully awake and tending to Sam's needs, even after she's asleep.

What does the morning bring?
1112311.title: Clean yourself up for round two?

choices: You don't want to die by sweaty digits, so you do it!
Looking at the flip flops, you decide this is too much!
112.content:
"Lick and kiss my flip flops? Yeah, I like that idea! Here you go!" Katelyn gets her glistening flip flops from the door. She lays them down for you. "I know we're friends, Brian, but you better lick clean these awful things, or else!" She mimed stomping on your face.

Do you do it?
112.title: Lick and kiss my flip-flops?

1121.content:
Not wanting to suffer any more pain was an inspiration sure but you tried to be level headed and thought that you are in no power in this situation and it would be for the best to get this over with.
You look at Katelyn's face and wonder what has gotten into her and start making puppy eyes and trying to win her over by kissing her foot instead of her flip flops she gives a bemused smile
Why though? Did she look through your plan or did she like having you beneath her or is it something else
1121.title: You don't want to die by sweaty digits, so ...

113.content: Katelyn smirks down, and says "see these feet? Give each 100 kisses!"
113.title: Kiss my feet?

1131.content: Katelyn moves her feet close to your face expecting you to follow her comands, you can feel the warmth of her soles from only a few centimeters. You pucker up your lips and start to kiss her feet her sweat bathing your face as you kiss her left sole. "You better kiss those toes toes as well slave" she said in a menacing voice her toes were painted grey close to a rain clouds color and they looked pretty cute. "Yes, Mistress" you say as you start to kiss each individual toe starting from little toe to her big toe. She moaned a little with each kiss she was starting to like dominating you "Now the other foot" she said this went on for about 1 hour.
1131.title: You do it

11312.content: "Alright slave my feet feeling a little sore too give me a foot massage now" she said as she put her feet into your lap.You started massaging her left foot first by rubbing your hand on her soles her feet felt extremely soft and smooth, she moaned in delight to the way your hands caressed her soles.After her soles you start to massage the ball of her foot in a circular motion you do the same to her heel as well "If only you were kind enough to do this all the time I guess now that you're my slave this can happen more often" she said as she starts to giggle.Feeling humiliated you continue massaging her feet in silence. You massage each and every toe on her left foot last she orders you to place that foot down back onto your lap and massage the right foot next. This continues for good 20 minutes "Time to stop slave" she said "I think you did good enough I have a reward in store for you slave"......
11312.title: Foot massage

114.content: She lift her feet up and puts them on your face,her feet stink so bad you think you might hurl.she rubs her left foot on your face "Like that?" she said wiggleing her left foot toes on your mouth before taking her right foot on putting it on your nose,right under her toes "Either like me toes or ill smash you nose!" she saids grasping your nose inbetween her big and second toes with her other foot rubbing on your mouth.what will you do?
114.title: Use your face as a foot-stool?

1142.content: Apparently you took too long to answer, because she slammed her foot down on your nose as hard as you can. The pain along with the stench of her feet caused you to lose consciousness. When you woke up, to saw Katelyn along with her friends Abby, Andrea, Christina and Elizabeth. They look at you with an evil smile as they...
1142.title: Nose smashed?

11421.content: they all seat on the couch but Elizabeth who sit on your chest "My feet are so stinky...you better get used" and put them on your face with her right toes on your nose. They all did it and after sat on the couch "We want to do a game...you will be the judge...Which feet smell worst?"
11421.title: Smother you with their feet

info.brief_description: Your name is Brian, and your spending a week at your best friends house
info.description: Your name is Brian and you are forced to spend a week with your bestfriend. Her name is Katelyn she is a somewhat short girl with brown eyes, and long dirty-blonde hair. Her parents have to leave un-expectedly for the rest of the week. So you two are left alone in her house.
info.pretty_title: Beneath Your Best Friends Smelly Feet.
